original_text: And it came between the camp of the Egyptians and the camp of Israel; and it was a cloud and darkness to them, but it gave light by night to these: so that the one came not near the other all the night.
korean_text: 애굽 진과 이스라엘 진 사이에 이르러 서니 저쪽에는 구름과 흑암이 있고 이쪽에는 밤이 밝으므로 밤새도록 저쪽이 이쪽에 가까이 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: And it came between the camp of the Egyptians
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 이집트 사람들의 진영 사이에 왔고

sentences.original_text: and it was a cloud and darkness to them
but it gave light by night to these
so that the one came not near the other
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 한쪽이 다른 쪽에 가까이 오지 못했다
